name: Magnetic Maze
description:
Complete the maze with magnetic ball by changing the direction of magnetism.

Controls:

Change direction of magnetism - Arrow keys

Created by:

Artem Gulyaev
Juan C Osorio A

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" (WinterSemester 2020/21)
